TopicTitle: [Kerbin War II KWII]- Military Uniforms,Skins, and Flags!~: Request

Articles.Content:
Hey, Anybody Up For Making Some WW2 Inspired Military Uniforms and Flags for my Little KSP War Series? I specifically Need Soviet and N.A.Z.I Styled Stuff with a Retro Sci-Fi Twist to Them.

[List of Skins]-/Kerbzis/Kermany/- (The Bad Guys) -Kehrmacht Military Uniforms -Kuchutzstaffel (KK) Uniforms -KriegsKarine Uniforms -Kuftwaffe Pilot Outfits -------------------------- -/Koviets/USKR/- (The Slightly Less-Bad Guys... But Still Pretty Bad) -Koviet Army Uniforms -Koviet Navy Uniforms -Koviet Air Force Uniforms
